name: Espathra
description: The Ostrich Pokémon. It immobilizes opponents by bathing them in psychic power from its large eyes. Despite its appearance, it has a vicious temperament.

abilities.name: Opportunist
abilities.description: When the AC, STR, DEX, CON, INT, WIS, or CHA of a creature within 30ft of this Pokémon increases, then this Pokémon's corresponding attribute increases by the same amount. This effect lasts for the duration of battle, or for 1 minute.

abilities.name: Frisk
abilities.description: Upon entering a battle, a single opponent’s held item is revealed, if it has one.

abilities.name: Speed Boost
abilities.description: This Pokémon's speed is increased by 10 feet while in an environment related to its type (DM Discretion).
